txt.en: You have struck the training-dummy with Savage Strikes
Your trainer wants you to use your new skills to prove that you are ready to face the many dangers that exist in the world.

'Even in this refuge there are threats that we must confront. You will need to know how to defend yourself and push back these threats.

'If you wish to survive, you must learn skills from others, like myself. We can guide you through your training and help you to become stronger.

'Learn the skill <rgb=#00ff00>Savage Strikes</rgb> from me and show me that my teaching has given you mastery by striking the practice-dummy nearby.'

HINT:

Champions rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Fervour</rgb> to activate some of their skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Savage Strikes</rgb>.  Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Swift Strike</rgb> and <rgb=#00ff00>Wild Attack</rgb> skills to build <rgb=#ffff00>2 Fervour</rgb> and then strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Targeting Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#ffff00>Savage Strikes</rgb> skill.

You should talk to the trainer again and learn the skill <rgb=#00ff00>Savage Strikes</rgb>. Use your new skill on the training-dummy nearby. 

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Use the trainer and select Train Champion Skills to open the skill selection panel. Left-click on a skill to highlight it, then left-click the Train button at the bottom of the skill selection panel -- or double-click the skill -- and you will successfully purchase the skill.</rgb>

HINT:

Champions rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Fervour</rgb> to activate some of their skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Savage Strikes</rgb>.  Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Swift Strike</rgb> and <rgb=#00ff00>Wild Attack</rgb> skills to build <rgb=#ffff00>2 Fervour</rgb> and then strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Targeting Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#ffff00>Savage Strikes</rgb> skill.
'Yes, I sensed that you were well-prepared, [placeholder]. \n\n'Speak with Bolli and tell him that I believe you are prepared.'
The Champion Trainer is in Frerin's Court.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your newly-learned skill, return to your trainer and tell him of your success.
Make your way to Bolli and tell him that you have finished your meditation and prepared yourself for battle.

'Strike the training-dummy with your new skill, then return to me. We must make certain that you are prepared to stand against the dangers of Middle-earth.'

HINT:

Champions rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Fervour</rgb> to activate some of their skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Savage Strikes</rgb>.  Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Swift Strike</rgb> and <rgb=#00ff00>Wild Attack</rgb> skills to build <rgb=#ffff00>2 Fervour</rgb> and then strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Targeting Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#ffff00>Savage Strikes</rgb> skill.
'Yes, I knew that you were well prepared [placeholder]. \n\n'Speak with Bolli and tell him that I believe you are prepared.'
'I will teach you more when you are ready to learn, for the moment you should speak with Bolli.'
Strike the training-dummy with Savage Strikes
Talk to the Champion Trainer at Frerin's Court
Intro: The Thrill of the Fight
